com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.listeners

Class SCUISessionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.listeners.SCUISessionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener

    public class SCUISessionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener
    SCUISessionListener is a HttpSessionlistener which maintains a list of ISCUISessionAware listeners. When the session is created the sessionListeners' sessionCreated() method is called. When the session is invalidated the destroyedListeners' sessionDestroyed() method is called. rasrinivasan
